front.title: Test for router and BRAS devices on the degree of IPv6 support

abstract.t: This document introduces the test for the router and BRAS devices on the degree of IPv6 support. IPv6 functions and performance of the routers and BRAS widely deployed in current networks are included in testing items. It turns out that some specific IPv6 functions and performance are not well-supported by the router and BRAS devices. The test results have been discussed to share with internet community.
